attributes.action: Impose pricing limits on the Isle of Wight ferry operators.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Red Funnel and Wightlink are charging Ridiculous amounts of money for the privilage of travelling across the solent. This stretch of water is one of the most expensive to travel in the world.
As the Island is part of mainland UK the cost of services should be regulated by government policy.
Island residents very rarely receive reductions in fares making travel off the island extremely difficult especially for the low income bracket.
Holiday-makers will not come to the island thereby ensuring we suffer from financial recession. Soon PARKHURST will not need a wall!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
